name: swagger-codegen-staticdocs-rig
description: This is an ongoing development rig for working with mustache generator found in swagger-codegen The object is to generate docs based on data from swagger-codegen.

scripts.build: npm run compass_build && npm run code_samples
scripts.code_samples: for file in code_samples/*.mustache; do mustache data.json $file > code_samples/`basename $file .mustache`.js; done
scripts.compass_build: bundle exec compass clean && bundle exec compass compile
scripts.pages: (git checkout gh-pages && git merge develop -m 'merge in develop' && npm run compass_build && git add -f $npm_package_style_build && git commit -m 'force commit app.css' && git push -f)

author: Josh S Ponelat
